endpoints.description: Retrieve the current maintenance schedules for all utility infrastructure components.
Create a new maintenance schedule for a specified set of infrastructure components.
Update the existing maintenance schedule identified by the unique ID.
Remove a maintenance schedule from the system using its unique identifier.
Get the real-time operational status of all monitored components in the utility infrastructure.
Submit data for predictive analysis to identify potential future maintenance needs.
Retrieve information about allocated resources for specific maintenance tasks.
Allocate resources, such as personnel or equipment, for planned maintenance activities.
Return a list of active alerts and notifications regarding infrastructure status.
Update system configuration and preferences for maintenance scheduling and tracking.
